item.title: 美国消费者支出连续两个月强劲增长
item.description: 美国11月个人消费支出保持稳健增长，凸显出假日购物季伊始消费者需求依然强劲。【原文：US personal spending rose at a solid pace in November, underscoring a resilient consumer at the start of the holiday-shopping season.】

item.title: 沃伦敦促贝森特调查“不透明”的数据中心融资
item.description: 美国参议员伊丽莎白·沃伦与另外三名民主党参议员要求财政部长斯科特·贝森特对支持人工智能的大型债务计划及其对金融体系构成的风险展开调查。【原文：US Senator Elizabeth Warren and three other Senate Democrats are asking Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent to launch a probe into large debt packages supporting artificial intelligence and the risks they pose to the financial system.】

item.title: 安德森支持的Inferact在种子轮融资中筹集1.5亿美元
item.description: 由开源软件vLLM的创建者组建的人工智能初创公司Inferact，在种子轮融资中筹集了1.5亿美元，公司估值达8亿美元。【原文：Inferact, an AI startup formed by the creators of open-source software vLLM, has raised $150 million in a seed funding round that values the company at $800 million.】

item.title: 对冲基金净流入达1160亿美元，创2007年以来新高
item.description: 对冲基金去年募集资金规模创下金融危机以来新高，推动全行业资产规模突破5万亿美元的历史纪录。【原文：Hedge funds collected the most money since before the financial crisis last year, pushing industrywide assets past a record $5 trillion.】

item.title: 人工智能概念股领涨，数据板块走强，地缘政治风险消退提振股市
item.description: 美国股市延续涨势，因特朗普总统撤回关税威胁，同时交易员对人工智能概念股的投资热情重燃。【原文：US stocks extended gains on President Donald Trump’s retreat from tariff threats while traders’ appetite for artificial intelligence bets returned.】

item.title: 印尼总统在达沃斯表示，2026年印尼经济增长将加速
item.description: 印度尼西亚总统普拉博沃·苏比安托在达沃斯向商界精英推介其政策纲领时预测，作为东南亚最大经济体的印尼今年经济增长将加速。【原文：Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto predicted that growth will accelerate this year as he touted his policy program for Southeast Asia’s biggest economy to the business elite in Davos.】

item.title: 格雷格·科菲的对冲基金在前沿市场中发现机遇
item.description: 据格雷格·科菲旗下对冲基金柯科斯沃德资产管理公司的一位高管称，今年全球一些较为冷门的投资目的地将成为新兴市场的主要押注对象。【原文：Some of the world’s more exotic investment destinations are a top emerging-market bet for this year, according to an executive at Greg Coffey’s hedge fund Kirkoswald Asset Management.】

item.title: BCI旗下1820亿美元养老基金任命乔恩·萨隆为私募股权部门负责人
item.description: 不列颠哥伦比亚省投资管理公司任命乔恩·萨隆为新任全球私募股权业务主管，接替行业资深人士吉姆·皮特曼。皮特曼将于本月底离开该养老金计划。【原文：British Columbia Investment Management Corp. named Jon Salon as the new global head of private equity, succeeding industry veteran Jim Pittman, who is leaving the pension plan at the end of the month.】

item.title: 贝莱德新兴市场ETF规模激增创纪录60亿美元，美国投资者持续撤资
item.description: 随着资金从美国资产撤出的势头增强，投资者正以创纪录的速度向新兴市场基金注入资金。【原文：Investors are pouring cash into emerging-market funds at a record pace as momentum builds for a rotation out of US assets.】

item.title: 贝莱德首席执行官芬克对人工智能领域可能出现的泡沫并不担忧
item.description: 贝莱德公司首席执行官拉里·芬克表示，人工智能领域不存在泡沫，并强调了发展该技术所需的巨额投资。【原文：BlackRock Inc. Chief Executive Officer Larry Fink said there is no bubble in artificial intelligence, emphasizing the volume of investment needed to develop the technology.】

item.title: Waymo在迈阿密启动无人驾驶出租车服务，机场测试正在进行中
item.description: Waymo将于周四在迈阿密向公众提供无人驾驶出租车服务，这是这家隶属于Alphabet Inc.的公司计划今年推出的约十余个城市中的首个试点城市。【原文：Waymo will start offering its robotaxi service in Miami to the public Thursday, the first of around a dozen cities where the Alphabet Inc. company plans to launch this year.】

item.title: Circana数据显示，任天堂Switch 2在12月领跑美国游戏硬件市场
item.description: 据市场追踪机构Circana数据显示，任天堂公司在去年美国核心市场表现强劲，缓解了市场对旗舰Switch 2游戏机销量放缓的担忧。【原文：Nintendo Co. concluded last year with a strong performance in the key US market, according to market tracker Circana, allaying concern about a slowdown of the flagship Switch 2 console.】

item.title: 安大略教师养老金计划将部分资金转投公开市场
item.description: 安大略教师退休金计划首席执行官乔·泰勒表示，该养老金计划在去年出售了其私募市场投资组合中的若干资产后，目前正将资本"囤积"于公开市场。【原文：Ontario Teachers’ Pension Plan Chief Executive Officer Jo Taylor said that the pension is “warehousing” capital in public markets after selling several assets within its private market portfolio last year.】

item.title: 美国经济第三季度经修正后以4.4%的速度增长
item.description: 美国经济在第三季度的增长幅度略高于初步报告，这得益于出口的强劲表现以及库存拖累的减弱。【原文：The US economy expanded in the third quarter by slightly more than initially reported, supported by stronger exports and a smaller drag from inventories.】

item.title: 美国初请失业金人数维持在20万，显示裁员率处于低位
item.description: 上周美国失业救济申请人数基本持平，在经历了波动的假日季后，申请量已趋于稳定并维持在低位。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits were little changed last week, steadying at low levels after a volatile holiday season.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁称若欧洲抛售美国资产将实施"重大报复"
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普警告称，若欧洲国家因其针对格陵兰岛的关税威胁而抛售美国资产，将面临"重大报复"，此举旨在向这些国家施压，迫使其继续推进关于该岛未来的新协议。【原文：President Donald Trump vowed “big retaliation” if European countries sell US assets in response to his tariff threats related to Greenland, adding pressure on them to stick with an emerging deal over the future of the island.】

item.title: 自由港公司称印尼铜矿在致命泥石流后重启工作进展顺利
item.description: 自由港麦克莫兰公司周四表示，其位于印尼的庞大铜矿正逐步恢复生产。此前一场致命泥石流导致该矿停产，而该矿对全球铜供应至关重要。【原文：Freeport-McMoRan Inc. is making progress on a restart of its sprawling Indonesian copper mine, it said Thursday, after a deadly mudslide shuttered the operation that’s critical to global supply.】

item.title: 派拉蒙延长对华纳兄弟股份的要约收购
item.description: 派拉蒙天空舞公司再次延长了对华纳兄弟探索公司股票的要约收购期限，为投资者提供了更多时间来权衡其收购这家竞争对手媒体公司的提议。【原文：Paramount Skydance Corp. again extended its tender offer for Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. shares, giving investors more time to weigh its proposal to acquire the rival media company.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚暂停向厄瓜多尔出口电力，并实施反制关税
item.description: 哥伦比亚对厄瓜多尔对进口商品征收惩罚性关税的举措作出回应，暂停向其南部邻国出售电力，并实施了自身的关税措施。【原文：Colombia responded to Ecuador’s move to slap punitive duties on imports by halting electricity sales to its southern neighbor and imposing tariffs of its own.】

item.title: 越南政党名单显示总理、总统领导地位削弱
item.description: 越南共产党选举产生了新的最高决策机构，其中一些知名人物缺席，特别是现任总理和总统，这预示着新一届领导层的阵容。【原文：Vietnam’s Communist Party has elected a new top decision-making body with some high-profile names missing, notably the current prime minister and president, suggesting a new leadership line-up.】

item.title: 据报道，约旦当局利用Cellebrite技术入侵异见人士手机
item.description: 以色列数字取证公司Cellebrite被指控助长侵犯人权行为，此前约旦当局据称利用其技术破解活动人士的手机。【原文：Israeli digital forensics company Cellebrite has been accused of enabling human rights violations after authorities in Jordan allegedly used its technology to break into the mobile phones of activists.】

item.title: 芬坎蒂尼首席执行官称欧洲需在国防领域"更有效地花钱"
item.description: 芬坎蒂尼公司首席执行官皮耶罗贝托·福尔吉耶罗表示，在当前地缘政治风险不断加剧的背景下，加强欧洲各国间的协调至关重要，这有助于提升产能并加速发展进程。【原文：Fincantieri SpA Chief Executive Officer Pierroberto Folgiero says closer coordination among different European countries is critical to bolstering capacity and speeding up development at a time of mounting geopolitical risk.】

item.title: 哈里伯顿将油田设备出口至全球，随着压裂技术走向世界
item.description: 随着美国页岩油气产量增速放缓，这家石油服务巨头正将闲置设备转移至海外。【原文：The oil-services giant is moving idled equipment overseas as US shale growth slows】

item.title: 中国在人工智能领域落后是“童话故事”，Mistral首席执行官如是说
item.description: Mistral首席执行官亚瑟·门施表示，所谓中国人工智能技术落后于美国的论调纯属“童话故事”。【原文：Claims that Chinese technology for artificial intelligence lags the US are a “fairy tale,” Arthur Mensch, the chief executive officer of Mistral, said.】

item.title: Nedbank以溢价收购NCBA，加速东非市场布局
item.description: Nedbank集团正实施一项计划，旨在扩大其在非洲大陆的业务版图，挑战更大规模的竞争对手。这家南非金融机构正以溢价收购肯尼亚NCBA集团的多数股权。【原文：Nedbank Group Ltd. is executing a plan to boost its footprint across the continent and challenge bigger rivals, with the South African lender offering a premium to buy a majority stake in Kenya’s NCBA Group Plc.】

item.title: 米莱在达沃斯盛赞阿根廷与中国防务合作
item.description: 哈维尔·米莱对阿根廷与中国的蓬勃发展的经济联系进行了有力辩护，称该国除了寻求与美国的协议外，别无选择只能推进与北京的贸易。【原文：Javier Milei issued a robust defense of Argentina’s burgeoning economic ties with China, saying that his country had little choice but to pursue trade with Beijing — while seeking a deal with the US.】

item.title: 刚果计划通过首次发行欧元债券筹集7.5亿美元
item.description: 刚果民主共和国正准备于4月通过首次国际债券发售筹集7.5亿美元，并将把所得资金用于基础设施项目。【原文：The Democratic Republic of Congo is preparing to raise $750 million in April with its first international bond sale, and will use the proceeds to fund infrastructure projects.】

item.title: EQT首席执行官在收购科勒公司后瞄准房地产扩张
item.description: 私募股权集团EQT AB在完成一系列战略收购后，计划扩大其现有房地产业务版图，其中包括最新收购的二级市场平台科勒资本有限公司。【原文：Private equity group EQT AB wants to expand its existing real estate franchise after making a series of strategic acquisitions, including its latest purchase of secondaries platform Coller Capital Ltd.】

item.title: 墨西哥通胀涨幅低于预期，央行会议前夕
item.description: 墨西哥1月初通胀增速低于预期，市场认为央行在连续12次降息后，下次会议将维持基准利率不变。【原文：Mexico’s inflation accelerated less than expected in early January, as markets see the central bank keeping its benchmark interest rate unchanged at its next meeting after 12 straight cuts.】

item.title: PayPal收购Cymbio，最新代理式商务举措
item.description: PayPal控股公司已同意收购Cymbio——该平台旨在帮助商家通过人工智能聊天机器人销售产品。交易条款未予披露。【原文：PayPal Holdings Inc. agreed to acquire Cymbio, a platform designed to help merchants sell products across AI chatbots. Terms weren’t disclosed.】
